alert.note: Alert for Washington (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 10:03AM MDT until March 15 at 5:34PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Weiser River Near Weiser affecting Washington County. For the Weiser River...including Weiser. Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Weiser River Near Weiser. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Minor flooding of fields and agricultural land near Weiser is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 545 PM MDT.
